definition: that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
(negative prefix for verbs)/have not/not
drowned/to end/to die/to inundate
mistake/wrong/bad/interlocking/complex/to grind/to polish/to alternate/to stagger/to miss/to let slip/to evade/to inlay with gold or silver
surname Cuo

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 尽管来日方长，但是及早打算总没错。

sentences.english: I'm your Aunt Monica. Yes, I am.
sentences.chinese: 宾，我是你姑姑摩妮卡，没错。

sentences.english: That's true.And more Chinese step on the cover of "Times".
sentences.chinese: 没错，而且越来越多的中国人登上了时代周刊封面。

sentences.english: That's right,Nigel. I think we can keep cost down .
sentences.chinese: 一点也没错，奈杰尔，我们认为花费可以降低。

sentences.english: Because your life was transformed by this letter of acceptance, ? right?
sentences.chinese: 因为你的人生被这封录取信改变，没错吧？

sentences.english: Yes, only a rat puppet beat them out.
sentences.chinese: 没错，只有一个老鼠木偶打败过他们。

sentences.english: And, yes, I mean one of our parties.
sentences.chinese: 还有，没错，我说的是政党之一。

sentences.english: Water, yeah. They're seedy, aren't they?
Yes, he is a gigantic egotistical overrated artist.
sentences.chinese: 没错，他是一个极度自负的却被高估的演员。

sentences.english: I was right--later on I found out the car was stolen.
sentences.chinese: 我还真是没错，后来我才发现那辆车是偷来的。

sentences.english: Yep, going right back to the Bronze Age.
sentences.chinese: 没错，可以直接追溯至铜器时代。

sentences.english: "Well, " said Tyrion, "a maester does not need a cock. "
sentences.chinese: “没错，”提利昂说，“学士才不需要老二呢。”
你可能说的没错，外地人先生。

sentences.english: It was right then I started thinking about Thomas Jefferson…
sentences.chinese: 没错，我很尽看，于是我开始考虑杰弗逊起草的。

definition: yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
(a groaning sound)
(nonverbal grunt as interjection)/OK, yeah/what?
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
(onom.) laughing out loud
as for/when it comes to
right or wrong?/Is it right?/OK, yes? (colloquial)
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
surname Yao
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
to appear to be/to seem as if
really/sure enough/as expected/if indeed
(question particle for "yes-no" questions)
see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine
(coll.) As a matter of fact, ... (used to introduce evidence for what one has just asserted)
